resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2798</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ask Lucy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bitten Sie Um um Lucy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Demandez Lucy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Peça Lucy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chieda Lucy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρωτήστε Lucy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pida Lucy</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A student assignment for assessment, of a reading comprehension activity, where students read letters to and advice column and answer questions and respond to the problems indicated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">responses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Kursteilnehmeranweisung für Einschätzung, 
einer Leseerfassenaktivität, der Kursteilnehmer Briefe und 
Ratespalte- und -antwortfragen lesen und auf die zu angezeigten 
Probleme reagieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une affectation d'étudiant pour l'évaluation, 
d'une activité de compréhension de lecture, à où les étudiants 
lisent des lettres et des questions de colonne et de réponse de 
conseil et répondent aux problèmes indiqués.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma atribuição do estudante para a avaliação,
de uma atividade da compreensão da leitura, a onde os estudantes 
leiam letras e perguntas da coluna e da resposta do conselho e 
respondam aos problemas indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un'assegnazione dell'allievo per la valutazione, 
di un'attività di comprensione della lettura, a dove gli allievi 
leggono le lettere e le domande della colonna e di risposta di 
consiglio e rispondono ai problemi indicati.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ανάθεση σπουδαστών για την αξιολόγηση, μιας 
δραστηριότητας κατανόησης ανάγνωσης, όπου οι σπουδαστές 
διαβάζουν τις επιστολές και τη στήλη συμβουλών και απαντούν στις 
ερωτήσεις και αποκρίνονται στα προβλήματα που υποδεικνύονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una asignación del estudiante para el gravamen, 
de una actividad de la comprensión de la lectura, a donde los 
estudiantes leen letras y preguntas de la columna y de la respuesta 
del consejo y responden a los problemas indicados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antworten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension de lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réponses</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão da leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">respostas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione della lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">risposte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ανάγνωσης</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">απαντήσεις</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">respuestas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
